item.title: Scott Wiener on his fight to make Big Tech disclose AI’s dangers
item.description: The California lawmaker is on his second attempt to pass a first-in-the-nation AI safety bill. This time, it might work.

item.title: How Google’s dev tools manager makes AI coding work
item.description: Google PM Ryan Salva is responsible for tools like Gemini CLI, giving him a front-row seat to the ways AI tools are changing software development.

item.title: Disney is raising the price of Disney+, Hulu subscriptions next month
item.description: The timing of the price increases isn’t ideal, as Disney+ subscribers canceled their subscriptions in droves last week, protesting Disney’s decision t...

item.title: Uber-rival Rapido doubles valuation to $2.3B following Swiggy stake sale
item.description: Swiggy has offloaded its entire 12% stake in Rapido for about $270 million through two separate deals.

item.title: Jaguar Land Rover to pause production until next week – at least
item.description: After yet another extension, the shutdown caused by a cyberattack will last at least four weeks.
